description:
Chieko invites the class to an moon-watching party in her garden, where a UFO appears! A space mouse, Michi-Michi, beams down from it and confesses her love for their teacher Yamagata. But Mishima Industries attempts to capture her, and Nuku Nuku has to stop them!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nuku Nuku and the mystics of the universe - The meeting with the mysterious alien Michi Michi
Nuku Nuku to Uchuu no Shinpi! Nazo no Seimeitai Michi Michi to no Souguu!
ヌクヌクと宇宙の神秘!謎の生命体ミチミチとの遭遇!
